item.title: Scratchpad for Home Automation
item.description: Initial setup hassio running on VM esphome installed Network info iw dev - will show you all the wireless interface names Flashing using Tuya Convert pulled image and build as Tuya-convert instructions after pull did docker-compose exec tuya bash will enable interaction to the container run it the container and see the screen do screen -ls to see all the screen running do screen -r to attach to the screen to see the info all of this is sitting in the base /usr/bin/tuya-convert/script/*.
